features.name: Dynamic Route Matching
features.description: The router dynamically matches the current URL to the predefined routes, handling path parameters and query parameters (e.g., '/user/{id}' matching '/user/123').

features.name: Component Loading
features.description: When a route is matched, the corresponding component is loaded. Additionally, the component can load data using a 'loader' function before rendering.

features.name: State Preservation on Navigation
features.description: The router preserves the scroll position across different routes. It stores the scroll position of the current route and restores it when navigating back to it.

features.name: Programmatic Navigation
features.description: The router supports programmatic navigation via the 'navigate' function, which allows navigation to a different URL without reloading the page.

features.name: Context Management
features.description: The router utilizes the `SystemContext` to manage routing-related state and context, providing it to child components within the route.

props.name: onRoute
props.description: An optional callback function that is triggered when the route is changing. It receives a boolean indicating whether the route is loading (true) or not (false). This can be used to show a loading indicator or handle state transitions.
